description: Yuki Namanke is a 19-year-old Japanese Yakuza member and the daughter of a feared Yakuza leader.  She is skilled in combat and firearm handling, balancing her responsibilities to her family and the Yakuza with a forbidden romance with an American exchange student, Johnny.  After her father's death, Yuki takes over leadership, navigating the dangerous world of organized crime while also pursuing her personal life.
